verbs.description: With a mix of flattery and resolve , South Korean President Moon Jae - in [V: has] played a pivotal role in bringing together President Trump and North Korea 's Kim Jong Un . But Moon faces deep risks at home and in Washington if Tuesday 's summit in Singapore goes sour .

[ARGM-MNR: With a mix of flattery and resolve] , [ARG0: South Korean President Moon Jae - in] has [V: played] [ARG1: a pivotal role] [ARGM-LOC: in bringing together President Trump and North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] . But Moon faces deep risks at home and in Washington if Tuesday 's summit in Singapore goes sour .
